dialogue.line: Hey Alfred, do you know what's going on here?
I said it's a nice night, innit?
...Look, I need your help. I'm looking for -
Yes. Do you know where he -
Hehehe... Had a change of heart now, 'ave we?
Things get too hard so you just sod off to the military for 12 months, right? Leave everything behind?
Throw away any letters you receive just to forget it all?
Completely shut your son out of your life?
... How do you know about that?
But now you want to find him, right?
Now you want to take care of him and be a good parent?
Well. You're about 12 months too late for that, Raymond.
